paragraphs.name: 0c6e
paragraphs.text: Republicans’ town halls all over the country have erupted in anger. Some lawmakers are avoiding their constituents entirely. One Congressman even sneaked away from his own event when faced with questions about the Affordable Care Act.

paragraphs.name: 5eca
paragraphs.text: Cassidy later told reporters this was the first time he had seen more than a hundred people at a town hall. The first-term senator, like many of his colleagues in Congress, is facing protests over his support of President Donald Trump’s cabinet nominees and his party’s agenda — in particular their plan to roll back health care reform, potentially leaving millions of Americans suddenly uninsured.

virtuals.subtitle: — “Im a Republican who recently learned that Obamacare is the ACA. I need the ACA to live.”

f4059ab0de4b.title: The Sanders movement has not ended.

paragraphs.name: 8a2b
paragraphs.text: The Sanders movement has not ended. If we are patient instead of petulant, humble rather than told-you-so!, and just a bit optimistic we could see this as an opportunity at unifying people over both Parties.

d72c013974d2.title: Get used to it C, mother fucker.

paragraphs.name: 0a53
paragraphs.text: Get used to it C, mother fucker. Your boy T woke us ALL up now! You dogs better learn to sit for The People now or expect some justice.

paragraphs.name: f5ff
paragraphs.text: Bravo, you wonderful people! Once a person is elected to public office, he/she is the employee of all their constituents, not just the people who voted for them. Corporations and our own passivity have eroded that somewhat, so it’s heartening to see people taking action.

97dde24a1e99.title: What we don’t seem to understand when we chant “Do your job!”

content.subtitle: Cassidy must ask his wife at night, “Why are they mad at me? I am doing my job…”

paragraphs.name: 1c4f
paragraphs.text: What we don’t seem to understand when we chant “Do your job!” is that to Cassidy he IS doing his job. he feels his job is to support and enrich the top 1% at the expense of the common man.
Cassidy must ask his wife at night, “Why are they mad at me? I am doing my job…”

29510f61e563.title: This entire administration is simply off the rails.

paragraphs.name: 41ef
paragraphs.text: This entire administration is simply off the rails. They are drunk with power and hell bent on forcing their ultra conservative, pro big business agenda on the rest of us. All with no regard to how the majority of Americans actually feel. It is truly amazing how anti America this administration is. Purely shameful and pathetic.

paragraphs.text: These protests are nothing compared to the thousands of residents who came out to town halls to protest the Obamacare law Democrats were pushing. And the difference is shocking too.

698cd11f785d.title: It’s good to see Americans stand up for their rights.

paragraphs.text: It’s good to see Americans stand up for their rights. But it’s sad to see that it took this degree of personal selfishness to see many of these people working and fighting as others of us have done for most of our lives. Until their very lives were at stake, they had no more concern for justice or equality than these republican politicians have every day. Sad. (No, genuinely, seriously sad.)

ed4d65fb4f81.title: Said it before, will say it again .

paragraphs.text: Said it before, will say it again . . . IF they take away ACA, take away their health care coverage. What ever is good enough for us is good enough for all of them. Every last one should lose their coverage.
